name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Henry James STEIN

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Henry James STEIN.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
LARSEN and McDERMOTT, JJ., dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: John C. Pettit, Dist. Atty., Michael J. Fagella, John F. DiSalle, Asst. Dist. Attys., Washington, for appellant.
Samuel S. Pangburn, Jerome DeRiso, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
Henry James Stein, Washington, in pro per.
casebody.head_matter:
564 A.2d 161
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Henry James STEIN.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 29, 1989.
Decided Oct. 6, 1989.
John C. Pettit, Dist. Atty., Michael J. Fagella, John F. DiSalle, Asst. Dist. Attys., Washington, for appellant.
Samuel S. Pangburn, Jerome DeRiso, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
Henry James Stein, Washington, in pro per.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
